revision.text:
Los Pokémon variocolor se pueden obtener de múltiples maneras, cada una con sus propias probabilidades. Desde la versión 0.9.3, la única manera de incrementar las probabilidades de encontrarse con Pokémon variocolor son equiparse el [[Shiny Charm|Amuleto Iris]], usar la [[Azure Flute|Flauta Azul]] o hacer crecer bayas [[Starf|Arabol (Starf)]] en la [[Farm|Granja]] (Una vez madura, cada baya Arabol (Starf) otorga un aumento de 1,015%). =Posibilidades= {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Localización/Método !! Probabilidad (Sin Amuleto Iris) !! Probabilidad (Con Amuleto Iris al Nivel 5) !! Probabilidad (Con Amuleto Iris al Nivel 5 y la Granja llena de bayas Arabol (Starf)) |- | [[Regions|Encuentro en Ruta]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Encuentro en Mazmorra]] || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Objeto de Evolución]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone|Encuentro en Zona Safari]] |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Incubando un huevo]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Pokémon Itinerantes]] |- | [[Shops|Pokémon comprado en Tienda]] |- |} =Estrategias de incubación de Pokémon variocolor y la granja= La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Formación de Bayas !! Ranking de Eficiencia !! Formación de Bayas !! revision.comment: Created page with "Los Pokémon variocolor se pueden obtener de múltiples maneras, cada una con sus propias probabilidades. Desde la versión 0.9.3, la única manera de incrementar las probabilidades de encontrarse con Pokémon variocolor son equiparse el [[Shiny Charm|Amuleto Iris]], usar la [[Azure Flute|Flauta Azul]] o hacer crecer bayas [[Starf|Arabol (Starf)]] en la [[Farm|Granja]] (Una vez madura, cada baya Arabol (Starf) otorga un aumento de 1,015%)."

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Posibilidades= {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Localización/Método !! Probabilidad (Sin Amuleto Iris) !! Probabilidad (Con Amuleto Iris al Nivel 5) !! Probabilidad (Con Amuleto Iris al Nivel 5 y la Granja llena de bayas Arabol (Starf)) |- | [[Regions|Encuentro en Ruta]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Encuentro en Mazmorra]] || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Objeto de Evolución]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone|Encuentro en Zona Safari]] |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Incubando un huevo]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Pokémon Itinerantes]] |- | [[Shops|Pokémon comprado en Tienda]] |- |} =Estrategias de incubación de Pokémon variocolor y la granja= La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Formación de Bayas !! Ranking de Eficiencia !! Formación de Bayas !! Abono y Psydugadera |- | [[Starf|Arabol (Starf)]] || - || - || - |- | [[Petaya|Yapati (Petaya)]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chople|Pomaro (Chople)]] || 19 h 59 min 59 seg hasta la madurez || 13 h 19 min 59 seg hasta la madurez || 8 h 53 min 19 seg hasta la madurez |- | [[Lum|Ziuela (Lum)]] || 12 h 59 min 59 seg hasta la madurez || 8 h 39 min 39 seg hasta la madurez || 5 h 46 min 39 seg hasta la madurez |} =Notas= Desde la versión 0.3.0 los Pokémon variocolor incrementan el daño de los Clicks un 150% en comparación con un Pokémon normal. [[Category:Shinies|Categoría:Variocolor]]

Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Localización/Método !! Probabilidad (Sin Amuleto Iris) !! Probabilidad (Con Amuleto Iris al Nivel 5) !! Probabilidad (Con Amuleto Iris al Nivel 5 y la Granja llena de bayas Arabol (Starf)) |- | [[Regions|Encuentro en Ruta]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Encuentro en Mazmorra]] || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Objeto de Evolución]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone|Encuentro en Zona Safari]] |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Incubando un huevo]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Pokémon Itinerantes]] |- | [[Shops|Pokémon comprado en Tienda]] |- |} =Estrategias de incubación de Pokémon variocolor y la granja= La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Estrategias de incubación de Pokémon variocolor y la granja= La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Formación de Bayas !! Ranking de Eficiencia !! Formación de Bayas !! revision.comment: Created page with "=Estrategias de incubación de Pokémon variocolor y la granja="

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! [[Category:Shinies|Categoría:Variocolor]]

Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! [[Category:Shinies|Categoría:Variocolor]]

Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).

=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! [[Category:Shinies|Categoría:Variocolor]]

Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la granja. Además, se ha creado una [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Calculadora de incubación variocolor] para calcular de manera más exacta los índices de obtención de un Pokémon Variocolor a través de la incubación. ===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Formación de Bayas !! Ranking de Eficiencia !! Formación de Bayas !! revision.comment: Created page with "La manera más efectiva para obtener [[Pokémon]] variocolor es a través de la [[Pokemon Day Care|Guardería Pokémon]]. La [[Farm|Granja]] puede ser usada tanto para incrementar los pasos por derrotar Pokémon (Provocando mayor velocidad de incubación) así como mejorar la probabilidad de un encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor. A continuación se puede encontrar una tabla con las estrategias más óptimas para capturar Pokémon variocolor empleando formaciones en la..."

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

revision.comment: Created page with "===Ranking de Estrategias Óptimas==="

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
===Optimal Strategy Rank Table===

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
===Optimal Strategy Rank Table===

revision.comment: Created page with "NOTA: Esta tabla asume un perfecto plantado, de forma que todas las bayas no se plantan al mismo tiempo pero llegan al estado de madurez al mismo tiempo."

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
===Optimal Strategy Rank Table===

Expanded Rate Table Calculations ''All calculations for Rank Table done [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kyQIpahGezv8tYYeQDoZMHjw6cVyGr7FD4MlXgbPr68/edit?usp=sharing here]''
Leyenda: *MAP - Máximo Aumento de Pasos *MAV - Máximo Aumento de Variocolor *DA - Duración del Aumento (horas) *MTR - Máximo tiempo para replantar (horas) *TA% - % de Tiempo de Actividad *MAP c/ TA% - Máximo aumento de Pasos factorizado con el tiempo de actividad *MAV c/ TA% - Máximo aumento de variocolor factorizado con el tiempo de actividad *RE - Ranking de Efectividad, donde el 1 es lo mejor
Note: The table assumes perfect planting, where berries are planted not at the same time, but are planted so all plants are in the berry stage at the same time.

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
===Optimal Strategy Rank Table===

Expanded Rate Table Calculations ''All calculations for Rank Table done [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kyQIpahGezv8tYYeQDoZMHjw6cVyGr7FD4MlXgbPr68/edit?usp=sharing here]''
Leyenda: *MAP - Máximo Aumento de Pasos *MAV - Máximo Aumento de Variocolor *DA - Duración del Aumento (horas) *MTR - Máximo tiempo para replantar (horas) *TA% - % de Tiempo de Actividad *MAP c/ TA% - Máximo aumento de Pasos factorizado con el tiempo de actividad *MAV c/ TA% - Máximo aumento de variocolor factorizado con el tiempo de actividad *RE - Ranking de Efectividad, donde el 1 es lo mejor
Note: The table assumes perfect planting, where berries are planted not at the same time, but are planted so all plants are in the berry stage at the same time.

revision.comment: Created page with "Leyenda: *MAP - Máximo Aumento de Pasos *MAV - Máximo Aumento de Variocolor *DA - Duración del Aumento (horas) *MTR - Máximo tiempo para replantar (horas) *TA% - % de Tiempo de Actividad *MAP c/ TA% - Máximo aumento de Pasos factorizado con el tiempo de actividad *MAV c/ TA% - Máximo aumento de variocolor factorizado con el tiempo de actividad *RE - Ranking de Efectividad, donde el 1 es lo mejor"

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
===Optimal Strategy Rank Table===

====Formación Arabol (Starf)==== Plantar bayas Arabol (Starf) puede aumentar la probabilidad de Variocolor en todos los encuentros Pokémon, incluídos los incubados. revision.comment: Created page with "Plantar bayas Arabol (Starf) puede aumentar la probabilidad de Variocolor en todos los encuentros Pokémon, incluídos los incubados. A continuación puedes encontrar una tabla con la formación más eficiente empleando únicamente bayas Arabol (Starf)."

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

Note: The table assumes perfect planting, where berries are planted not at the same time, but are planted so all plants are in the berry stage at the same time.

====Starf Planting Formation====
Planting Starf Berries can increase the Shiny Rate of all Pokémon encounters, including hatched eggs. Below is a Planting Table of the most efficient setup to use only Starf Berries.

revision.comment: Created page with "Plantar bayas Arabol (Starf) y Pomaro (Chople) juntas aumenta la probabilidad de variocolor y los pasos ganados al mismo tiempo. A continuación puedes encontrar una tabla con la formación más eficiente."

revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
===Optimal Strategy Rank Table===

Note: The table assumes perfect planting, where berries are planted not at the same time, but are planted so all plants are in the berry stage at the same time.

[[Category:Shinies|Categoría:Variocolor]]

Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
=Odds=
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item/Level Up Evolutions]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shop Pokémon]] |- |}
=Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy=
[[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.

Note: The table assumes perfect planting, where berries are planted not at the same time, but are planted so all plants are in the berry stage at the same time.

====Starf + Lum Planting Formation====
Plantar bayas Arabol (Starf) cerca de al menos una baya Ziuela (Lum) aumenta la probabilidad de encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor, incluyendo los incubados, frente a usar únicamente bayas Arabol (Starf). Abono y Psydugadera |- | [[Starf|Arabol (Starf)]] || - || - || - |- | [[Petaya|Yapati (Petaya)]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chople|Pomaro (Chople)]] || 19 h 59 min 59 seg hasta la madurez || 13 h 19 min 59 seg hasta la madurez || 8 h 53 min 19 seg hasta la madurez |- | [[Lum|Ziuela (Lum)]] || 12 h 59 min 59 seg hasta la madurez || 8 h 39 min 39 seg hasta la madurez || 5 h 46 min 39 seg hasta la madurez |} =Notas= Desde la versión 0.3.0 los Pokémon variocolor incrementan el daño de los Clicks un 150% en comparación con un Pokémon normal. revision.comment: Created page with "Plantar bayas Arabol (Starf) cerca de al menos una baya Ziuela (Lum) aumenta la probabilidad de encuentro con un Pokémon variocolor, incluyendo los incubados, frente a usar únicamente bayas Arabol (Starf). A continuación puedes encontrar una tabla con la formación más eficiente."
